name: Go monsters
description:
Test your skills at collecting the monsters by playing a multi-level running game.

Stuck inside on a rainy day? In a boring meeting that you cannot leave? You're in luck! Go monsters is here to save you!

Collect all of the monsters by completing levels in this challenging running game, with the road twisting and turning under your feet. Every 6 completed levels you will encounter and collect one of the 8 monsters; with a total of 48 levels to master, hours of fun are guaranteed.

Features:
- 48 levels, progressing from easy to insanely hard
- 8 monsters to collect
- 8 characters to choose from!
- turn left/right and jump to stay on course
- just a single tap to perform an action! ideal for stealth playing!
